content: lion brand pattern # 20163-c *ccusa-patrioticpocketwrap pdf modified april 2007* skill level beginner chunky usa article #420 *discontinued* 3 colors 310 yards each *shown in flag blue snowcap white patriot red* crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm worked in single_crochet pockets are sewn on to finish see also patriotic pocket wrap knit 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/patriotic-pocket-wrap-knit
